channel.title: Comments on: Considering a life less travelled
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Edwin
item.dc:creator: Edwin
item.description: <p>I spend a great deal of time in Brazil. They are a people that know how to live life in the moment. It has had a great effect on me. I am more relaxed and stress free while here. Life is getting shorter every day and I have decided that I don't want to let it pass me by. Thanks for your Blog.</p>
item.content:encoded: I spend a great deal of time in Brazil. They are a people that know how to live life in the moment. It has had a great effect on me. I am more relaxed and stress free while here. Life is getting shorter every day and I have decided that I don’t want to let it pass me by. Thanks for your Blog.

item.title: By: free music downloading site

item.description: <p>Action is the last refuge of those who cannot dream.</p>
item.content:encoded: Action is the last refuge of those who cannot dream.

item.title: By: mor
item.dc:creator: mor
item.description: Somebody gave me the advice to do something different from what I am used to: think with the heart and feel with the brain. Maybe it helps you as well! I am so sure you will choose the right thing! yours M.
item.content:encoded:
Somebody gave me the advice to do something different from what I am used to: think with the heart and feel with the brain. Maybe it helps you as well!
I am so sure you will choose the right thing!
yours
M.

item.title: By: Rob
item.dc:creator: Rob
item.description:
Overheard at a party:
"Follow your heart. Then the worst can will happen is that you will die."
My life also seems to incorporate an ongoing theme of freedom-vs.-security. I've noticed that I'm happiest and most effective when I simply do what I need to do, and Universe seems to provide whatever I really need, "just in time". Chasing what I think I need seems about as futile as chasing a photon.
I know you'll find the balance that works for you.
item.content:encoded:
Overheard at a party:

“Follow your heart. Then the worst can will happen is that you will die.”

My life also seems to incorporate an ongoing theme of freedom-vs.-security. I’ve noticed that I’m happiest and most effective when I simply do what I need to do, and Universe seems to provide whatever I really need, “just in time”. Chasing what I think I need seems about as futile as chasing a photon.

I know you’ll find the balance that works for you.
